response.overview: Egyptian comedy comedy review of the starring artist Ahmed Badir and announcer Reham Said and a selection of comedian artists with high quality HDTV  The show is a lyrical review of the social problems that have a political dimension, including that the love of people can achieve all our dreams without the need for a chair or office, and shows the character of "Morsi" embodied by Ahmed Badir in the framework of comedy.
response.title: مسرحية مرسى عاوز كرسى
